name: hud_scaling
description: Scale the size of the HUD elements

name: cl_obs_interp_pos_rate
description: Adjust the speed of the camera transition between players

name: cl_obs_interp_speed
description: Sets how fast the smoothed spectator camera will move when interpolating between targets

name: cl_hud_radar_background_alpha
description: Set the opacity of the radar background

name: cl_hud_radar_scale
description: Set the size of the radar in the HUD

name: cl_radar_scale
description: Set the zoom level of the radar

name: cl_radar_scale_alternate
description: Set the alternate zoom level of the radar

name: cl_ironsight_dot_scale
description: Set the scale of the dot in the center of the scope when using rifles with iron sights

name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_flash
description: Set the delay for the flashbang line-up crosshair

name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_explosive
description: Set the delay for the HE grenade line-up crosshair

name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_fire
description: Set the delay for the Molotov/incendiary grenade line-up crosshair

name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_smoke
description: Set the delay for the smoke grenade line-up crosshair

name: cl_grenadecrosshairdelay_decoy
description: Set the delay for the decoy grenade line-up crosshair

name: cl_hud_telemetry_frametime_poor
description: Set the threshold for poor frame time conditions, write the minimum FPS value here

name: cl_hud_telemetry_net_misdelivery_poor
ingameName: Network tick miss rate warning threshold
description: Set the threshold for poor network conditions, write the maximum tick miss rate here

name: sensitivity
description: Set the mouse sensitivity for aiming

name: zoom_sensitivity_ratio
description: Set the sensitivity multiplier for zoomed aiming

name: cl_teamid_overhead_fade_near_crosshair
ingameName: Team ID Overhead Fade Near Crosshair
description:
Changes the opacity of your team mates names when your crosshair is near them
You can use a decimal value between 0-1
0: The name's opacity doesn't change
1: The name's opacity gets almost transparent
 I personally recommend 0.7-0.8

name: viewmodel_offset_x
description: Changes the X-axis of the viewmodel

name: viewmodel_offset_y
description: Changes the Y-axis of the viewmodel

name: viewmodel_offset_z
description: Changes the Z-axis of the viewmodel
